::Epyon::

He soars over the damaged ship, and sees Perndabot heading for a Maximal
lady bot.(Iron Raptor)
"Epyon, MAXIMIZE!"
He transformes to bot mode, dropping to the ground. Beam saber in hand,
he slashes at Perndabot.
